Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, and Blackstone due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, and Blackstone due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th & #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 95 95th, 112 Vincennes/111th & 108 Halsted/95th buses rerouted WB: 95th, Wentworth, 97th, Normal & 95th; EB 95th, Eggleston, 97th, Princeton & 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th and #108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Wentworth, 97th, Normal and 95th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Eggleston, 97th, Princeton and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ridgeland/South
ShortDescription: Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near Ridgeland/South.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near Ridgeland/South.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
